Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.fxml_controllers.window

Class RightTopbarController

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.fxml_controllers.window.RightTopbarController
public class RightTopbarController extends EventBusPublisher
Controller for the right-side top bar, managing button actions and subwindow requests.

    • initSubWindowService

      public void initSubWindowService()
      Initializes the subwindow service with the given top bar buttons.

      This method posts an InitSubWindowServiceRequest to the event bus containing references to all relevant toggle buttons.
